column4: guys! i need to install xlibs from breezy repos. How do i do that in Dapper? is there a ubuntu.packages or something? thanks
SonicChao: you have to just wait and be patient for your cd's
can someone answer my question please?
hello?
can someone help please
Guys!
Can someone tell me the Url for ubuntupackages
Guys! any of you know sysvconfig?
In SYSVCONFIG theres bluez-utils, is that for bluetooth? (trying to disable it)
Hello? any of you know whether bluez-utils in sysvconfig corresponds to bluetooth?
BlueZ - Official Linux Bluetooth protocol stack.  First google hit
do you know sysvconfig?
? i can disbable bluez-tooth there in sysvconfig would that disable bluetooth?
No, I use sysv-rc-conf.
Most likely yes it would disable bluetooth
is sysv-rc-conf better to use or ?...
really couldn't say because I've never used the other.  I find it simple enough though
is it sudo apt-get install sysv-rc-conf
yes
after you install sysv-rc-conf, you might like this thread. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=89491
thx man
